CustomField.description:
FY21 Return Policy (Effective 2/3/20) -Delinq Rebates that close and creation date is > 365 days from the returning oppty close date not book to AE -Remorse Refunds that close and creation date is > 365 days from the associated rev opptyâ€™s close date not book to AE
Pre FY21: Field was named "Delinquent Return Past 180 Days"
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2020,02,03), Age_of_Return_by_First_Purchase_Date__c > 180, CONTAINS(Pricebook2.Name,"Express"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Rebate"), ISPICKVAL(Rebate_Type__c, "Delinquent") ), TRUE, IF( AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2020, 02, 02), Age_of_Return_by_Rev_Oppty_close_date__c > 365, ISPICKVAL(Type, "Rebate"), ISPICKVAL(Rebate_Type__c, "Delinquent") ), TRUE, IF( AND( Age_of_Return_by_Rev_Oppty_close_date__c > 365, ISPICKVAL(Type, "Remorse Refund"), Swap__c = FALSE ), TRUE, FALSE ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, return WILL NOT book to AE. If false, return WILL book to AE.
CustomField.label: Return not booked to AE
